===Etymology===
Officially, with the creation of {{w|Taipeh Prefecture}} ({{w2|zh|臺北府}}) in 1875

===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# [[Taipei]]

====Usage notes====
* Although use of the full traditional form of 臺 is encouraged by the ROC Ministry of Education,<ref>{{Cite news |author=Shih Hsiu-chuan |title=Premier respects ‘choice’ on spelling |url=http://www.taipeitimes.com/News/taiwan/archives/2010/12/14/2003490913 |accessdate=8 Jan 2015|date=14 Dec 2010 |work=Taipei Times |page=3}}</ref> the simplified form {{lang|zh|台北}} is now more common than {{lang|zh|臺北}} in Taiwan and areas where [[Traditional Chinese|traditional Chinese]] is normally used.
